title: Ticket #5049: Report CPU and memory usage from blahp
description:
Currently, we don't get any CPU or memory usage information from the blahp for running jobs.

This means that the resulting ClassAd is relatively devoid of accounting details; to get useful accounting, we need to go to the PBS logfiles. This prevents us from doing nice Gratia probes from a HTCondor-CE itself.
